es.title: Sobre mi
es.presentation:
Desarrollador Full-Stack apasionado y orientado a resultados, con una s√≥lida base en ingenier√≠a de software, tecnolog√≠as web y dise√±o de sistemas. Me especializo en la creaci√≥n de aplicaciones web escalables y APIs utilizando Express.js, TypeScript y React Native, con un profundo conocimiento de bases de datos SQL y MongoDB.

Como Ingeniero de Sistemas, aporto un s√≥lido conocimiento de la computaci√≥n en la nube, los principios de ciberseguridad y la arquitectura integral de sistemas, desde la l√≥gica del backend hasta las interfaces intuitivas del frontend. üí° Me apasiona resolver problemas complejos, fomentar el aprendizaje continuo y colaborar en proyectos de impacto que impulsan la innovaci√≥n.

en.title: About me
en.presentation:
Passionate and results-driven Full-Stack Developer with a strong foundation in software engineering, web technologies, and system design. I specialize in building scalable web applications and APIs using Express.js, TypeScript, and React Native, with deep expertise in SQL and MongoDB databases.

As a Systems Engineer, I bring a solid understanding of cloud computing, cybersecurity principles, and full system architecture ‚Äî from backend logic to intuitive front-end interfaces. I‚Äôve successfully designed and deployed complete systems, led API development, and integrated modern technologies to deliver robust digital solutions.

üí° I thrive on solving complex problems, embracing continuous learning, and collaborating on impactful projects that push innovation forward.

cards.title: API REST con Express y MYSQL
cards.description: Desarrollado en Node.js con Express, dise√±ado para gestionar proyectos de manera eficiente y segura.
cards.detailedDescription:
Este proyecto es una API REST completa desarrollada con Node.js y Express.js que implementa un sistema robusto para la gesti√≥n de proyectos. La arquitectura sigue el patr√≥n MVC con capas bien definidas para rutas, controladores, servicios y modelos.

Caracter√≠sticas t√©cnicas incluyen autenticaci√≥n JWT con refresh tokens, sistema de roles (admin, editor, usuario), validaci√≥n de datos con express-validator, paginaci√≥n avanzada y filtrado de resultados. La base de datos MySQL est√° optimizada con √≠ndices adecuados y relaciones bien estructuradas.

El proyecto incluye documentaci√≥n Swagger integrada, manejo centralizado de errores, variables de entorno para diferentes ambientes (desarrollo, producci√≥n) y tests unitarios b√°sicos. Implement√© t√©cnicas de seguridad como rate limiting, sanitizaci√≥n de inputs y protecci√≥n contra SQL injection.

Endpoints RESTful
Validaci√≥n de datos
Sistema de roles y permisos
Documentaci√≥n con Swagger
challenges: Implementar autenticaci√≥n segura
Optimizar consultas a la base de datos

cards.title: API con NestJS y MySQL
cards.description: API REST robusta y modular construida con NestJS y MySQL, enfocada en escalabilidad y buenas pr√°cticas de desarrollo.
cards.detailedDescription:
Esta API construida con NestJS representa mi evoluci√≥n hacia frameworks m√°s estructurados. Aprovech√© al m√°ximo las caracter√≠sticas de TypeScript y la arquitectura modular de NestJS para crear un sistema altamente organizado.

El proyecto utiliza TypeORM para la conexi√≥n con MySQL, implementando el patr√≥n Repository para acceso a datos. Desarroll√© m√≥dulos independientes para cada dominio (auth, usuarios, proyectos), cada uno con sus servicios, controladores y entidades.

Incluye caracter√≠sticas avanzadas como: decoradores personalizados, interceptores globales para manejo de errores, validaci√≥n con class-validator, serializaci√≥n con class-transformer y documentaci√≥n autom√°tica con Swagger. Configur√© un sistema completo de variables de entorno para diferentes ambientes y escrib√≠ tests unitarios con Jest.

Inyecci√≥n de dependencias

cards.title: API REST Integrado con Supabase
cards.description: Desarrollado en Node.js con Express, dise√±ado para gestionar proyectos de manera eficiente y segura.
cards.detailedDescription:
Este proyecto demuestra mi capacidad para integrar servicios en la nube. Desarroll√© una API en Node.js que act√∫a como intermediario entre el cliente y Supabase, a√±adiendo l√≥gica de negocio adicional.

Implement√© autenticaci√≥n utilizando el sistema de Supabase Auth, con roles personalizados y pol√≠ticas de seguridad a nivel de fila (RLS). La API gestiona el almacenamiento en Supabase Storage, incluyendo subida de archivos, generaci√≥n de URLs firmadas y gesti√≥n de permisos.

Para la base de datos, aprovech√© las capacidades de PostgreSQL en Supabase, implementando funciones almacenadas y triggers. La API tambi√©n incluye endpoints para llamar a funciones serverless de Supabase y gestionar sus respuestas. Configur√© un sistema de webhooks para notificaciones en tiempo real.

cards.title: Oauth2.0 App
cards.description: Aplicaci√≥n para manejar la autenticaci√≥n de usuarios a trav√©s de OAuth 2.0. Emplea Passport.js para simplificar la integraci√≥n con proveedores de identidad como Google y GitHub

Este proyecto implementa un sistema completo de autenticaci√≥n OAuth 2.0 utilizando Passport.js. Configur√© estrategias para m√∫ltiples proveedores incluyendo Google, GitHub y credenciales locales.

El sistema incluye: sesiones persistentes con almacenamiento en Redis, serializaci√≥n/deserializaci√≥n de usuarios, protecci√≥n de rutas con middlewares, gesti√≥n de perfiles unificados y sistema de logout global. Implement√© un flujo completo de registro/login, incluyendo verificaci√≥n por email y recuperaci√≥n de contrase√±a.

Para mejorar la seguridad, a√±ad√≠ protecci√≥n CSRF, rate limiting en endpoints sensibles y sanitizaci√≥n de inputs. La aplicaci√≥n tambi√©n genera tokens de acceso/refresh para uso en APIs y gestiona permisos a nivel de ruta. Incluye un panel de administraci√≥n para gestionar usuarios y conexiones OAuth.

CineBook es una aplicaci√≥n m√≥vil desarrollada con React Native que ofrece una soluci√≥n completa para la reserva de entradas de cine. La aplicaci√≥n proporciona:

- Autenticaci√≥n segura con JWT

Tecnolog√≠as Clave:

- Navegaci√≥n: React Navigation

cards.title: Box Office API
cards.description: API REST con NestJS que proporciona datos en tiempo real sobre taquilla de pel√≠culas, rankings y an√°lisis comparativos entre EE.UU. y mercado mundial.
cards.detailedDescription:
Box Office API es una soluci√≥n moderna y escalable desarrollada con NestJS para entusiastas del cine, desarrolladores y analistas de datos. Esta API REST ofrece acceso en tiempo real a informaci√≥n detallada sobre el rendimiento de pel√≠culas en taquilla.

Caracter√≠sticas principales:
- Top de pel√≠culas del fin de semana (EE.UU.)
- Historial de taquilla diaria para an√°lisis de tendencias
- Comparativas entre ingresos en EE.UU. y mercados internacionales
- Integraci√≥n sencilla con aplicaciones frontend, bots o dashboards
- Documentaci√≥n interactiva con Swagger UI para pruebas en vivo

La API incluye un sistema de cach√© autom√°tico para optimizar el rendimiento y reducir solicitudes innecesarias a las fuentes externas. Es ideal para crear newsletters de cine, bots de Discord/Telegram, dashboards anal√≠ticos o proyectos acad√©micos sobre tendencias cinematogr√°ficas.

Desarrollada con buenas pr√°cticas: arquitectura modular, inyecci√≥n de dependencias, validaci√≥n de respuestas y manejo centralizado de errores. 100% open source y lista para integrarse en cualquier proyecto.

Datos hist√≥ricos de taquilla
Comparativas EE.UU. vs Mundial

cards.title: REST API with Express and MYSQL
cards.description: Developed in Node.js with Express, designed to manage projects efficiently and securely.
cards.detailedDescription:
This project is a complete REST API developed with Node.js and Express.js that implements a robust system for project management. The architecture follows the MVC pattern with well-defined layers for routes, controllers, services, and models.

Technical features include JWT authentication with refresh tokens, role-based system (admin, editor, user), data validation with express-validator, advanced pagination and results filtering. The MySQL database is optimized with proper indexes and well-structured relationships.

The project includes integrated Swagger documentation, centralized error handling, environment variables for different environments (development, production) and basic unit tests. I implemented security techniques like rate limiting, input sanitization and SQL injection protection.
features: JWT Authentication
RESTful Endpoints
Data Validation
Role-based permissions
Swagger Documentation
challenges: Implement Secure Authentication
Optimize Database Queries
Handle complex model relationships

cards.title: API with NestJS with MySQL
cards.description: Robust and modular REST API built with NestJS and MySQL, focused on scalability and best development practices.
cards.detailedDescription:
This API built with NestJS represents my evolution towards more structured frameworks. I fully leveraged TypeScript features and NestJS's modular architecture to create a highly organized system.

The project uses TypeORM for MySQL connection, implementing the Repository pattern for data access. I developed independent modules for each domain (auth, users, projects), each with its services, controllers and entities.

It includes advanced features like: custom decorators, global interceptors for error handling, validation with class-validator, serialization with class-transformer and automatic documentation with Swagger. I configured a complete environment variables system for different environments and wrote unit tests with Jest.
features: Modular architecture
Dependency injection
Built-in validation
Auto documentation
Repository pattern
challenges: Learning NestJS framework
Properly implementing TypeORM
Configuring independent modules

cards.title: REST API Integrated with Supabase
cards.description: Developed in Node.js with Express, designed to manage projects efficiently and securely.
cards.detailedDescription:
This project demonstrates my ability to integrate cloud services. I developed a Node.js API that acts as intermediary between client and Supabase, adding additional business logic.

I implemented authentication using Supabase Auth system, with custom roles and row-level security (RLS) policies. The API manages storage in Supabase Storage, including file uploads, signed URL generation and permission management.

For the database, I leveraged PostgreSQL capabilities in Supabase, implementing stored procedures and triggers. The API also includes endpoints to call Supabase serverless functions and manage their responses. I configured a webhooks system for real-time notifications.
features: Supabase authentication
Cloud storage
Realtime database
Serverless functions
API Gateway
challenges: Integrating Supabase Auth
Configuring row-level security
Optimizing realtime queries

cards.title: Oauth2.0 App
cards.description: Application to handle user authentication via OAuth 2.0. It uses Passport.js to simplify integration with identity providers like Google and GitHub.
cards.detailedDescription:
This project implements a complete OAuth 2.0 authentication system using Passport.js. I configured strategies for multiple providers including Google, GitHub and local credentials.

The system includes: persistent sessions with Redis storage, user serialization/deserialization, route protection with middlewares, unified profile management and global logout system. I implemented a complete registration/login flow, including email verification and password recovery.

For enhanced security, I added CSRF protection, rate limiting on sensitive endpoints and input sanitization. The application also generates access/refresh tokens for API use and manages route-level permissions. It includes an admin panel to manage users and OAuth connections.
features: Google authentication
GitHub authentication
Persistent sessions
Route protection
Profile management
challenges: Configuring multiple OAuth providers
Handling auth flows
Securing sensitive routes

cards.title: Payment App with Stripe and Paypal
cards.description: Developed in React and express to process payments with Stripe and PayPal.
cards.detailedDescription:
This full-stack project (React + Node.js) implements a complete payment processing system. I developed integration with both payment gateways (Stripe and PayPal) allowing users to choose their preferred method.

The system includes: persistent shopping cart, transaction history, recurring subscriptions, promotional discounts and email notifications. I implemented webhooks to handle async events like successful payments, refunds and cancellations.

For Stripe, I configured Payment Intents for SCA (Strong Customer Authentication) and managed different payment states. For PayPal, I implemented both the classic flow and the new smart buttons system. The application includes an admin dashboard to manage orders, process refunds and generate reports.
features: Stripe payment processing
PayPal integration
Shopping cart
Transaction history
Email notifications
challenges: Implementing two payment gateways
Handling payment webhooks
Securing sensitive data

cards.title: Movie Booking App
cards.description: Complete mobile application for booking movie tickets with film selection, showtimes, seat picking and integrated payment, built with React Native.
cards.detailedDescription:
CineBook is a mobile application developed with React Native that provides a complete solution for movie ticket booking. The app offers:

User Experience:
- Movie catalog with filters by genre, rating and release date
- Real-time booking system with visual seat selection
- Google Maps integration for locating nearby theaters
- Secure payment gateway with Stripe
- Food/drink combo management
- Secure authentication with JWT

Key Technologies:
- Frontend: React Native with Expo
- State Management: Redux Toolkit
- Navigation: React Navigation
- Authentication: JWT with refresh tokens
- Payments: Stripe SDK integration
- Geolocation: Google Maps API for React Native

Technical Features:
- Modular and scalable architecture
- Performance optimization for mobile devices
- Smooth animations for seat selection
- Real-time synchronization using sockets
- Responsive design for different screen sizes
features: Real-time seat booking with instant updates
Secure authentication with JWT and refresh tokens
Native Stripe integration for mobile payments
Nearby theater geolocation with Google Maps
Favorites system and personalized recommendations
Detailed booking and purchase history
Push notifications for reminders and offers
Offline support with background synchronization
challenges: Implementing seat selection with smooth animations in React Native
Optimizing performance for low-end devices
Managing complex states in an offline-first mobile app
Integrating multiple native SDKs (Stripe, Google Maps)
Maintaining real-time synchronization between users
Implementing fluid touch gesture navigation
Adapting UI for different screen sizes

technicalDetails.architecture: Modular architecture with clear component separation
technicalDetails.stateManagement: Redux Toolkit for global state + Context API for local state
technicalDetails.navigation: React Navigation with stack and bottom tabs
technicalDetails.performance: Optimization with memoization and reduced re-renders

cards.title: Box Office API
cards.description: REST API built with NestJS that provides real-time box office data, rankings, and comparative analysis between U.S. and global markets.
cards.detailedDescription:
Box Office API is a modern and scalable solution developed with NestJS for movie enthusiasts, developers, and data analysts. This REST API offers real-time access to detailed information about movie performance at the box office.

Key features:
- Weekend top movies ranking (U.S.)
- Historical daily box office data for trend analysis
- Comparative insights between U.S. and international earnings
- Easy integration with frontends, bots, or dashboards
- Interactive documentation with Swagger UI for live testing

The API includes an automatic caching system using Redis to optimize performance and reduce unnecessary requests to external sources. It's perfect for building cinema newsletters, Discord/Telegram bots, analytical dashboards, or academic projects on film trends.

Built with best practices: modular architecture, dependency injection, response validation, and centralized error handling. 100% open source and ready to integrate into any project.
features: Weekend top movies
Historical box office data
U.S. vs Worldwide comparisons
Integrated Swagger UI
Automatic caching for high performance
challenges: Reliable data extraction from web sources
Implementing an efficient caching system
Keeping endpoints automatically updated
Managing rate limiting from external APIs
Optimizing response times under load

technicalDetails.architecture: Modular architecture with independent services for scraping and data handling
technicalDetails.caching: Redis for temporary response caching to avoid overloading sources
technicalDetails.dataFetching: Controlled web scraping + public APIs with cross-validation
technicalDetails.deployment: Deployed on Render with CI/CD from GitHub

cards.detailedDescription: Medicare es un sistema web integral dise√±ado para mejorar la gesti√≥n operativa y cl√≠nica de centros m√©dicos, hospitales y cl√≠nicas. El sistema permite centralizar la administraci√≥n de pacientes, doctores, citas m√©dicas, departamentos y recursos hospitalarios, facilitando una comunicaci√≥n eficiente entre los distintos actores involucrados. cards.title: Hacienda Villa Blanca - Empresa Ganadera
cards.description: Sitio web informativo para una empresa ganadera dedicada a la producci√≥n agr√≠cola, ganader√≠a de calidad, conservaci√≥n ambiental y ecoturismo.
cards.detailedDescription: Hacienda Villa Blanca es una empresa ganadera dedicada a la producci√≥n agr√≠cola sostenible, cr√≠a selectiva de ganado de alta calidad, conservaci√≥n ambiental y ecoturismo. Este sitio web fue desarrollado para dar a conocer su historia, productos, proyectos de conservaci√≥n, razas de ganado disponibles, tours guiados por la hacienda, talleres de agricultura sostenible, ferias y testimonios de trabajadores. Incluye un mapa de ubicaci√≥n, secci√≥n de contacto con formulario y enlaces a redes sociales.
cards.objective: Crear una presencia digital atractiva y funcional que permita a Hacienda Villa Blanca mostrar sus actividades, productos y valores, facilitando la conexi√≥n con clientes, turistas y colaboradores interesados en la agricultura sostenible y la ganader√≠a de calidad.
cards.intendedFor: Clientes interesados en ganado de calidad, turistas, instituciones ambientales, estudiantes, agricultores sostenibles y p√∫blico en general interesado en ecoturismo y producci√≥n agr√≠cola responsable.
features: Presentaci√≥n de la historia y valores de la hacienda

Mapa interactivo de la ubicaci√≥n de la hacienda

Dise√±o moderno, responsivo y accesible en cualquier dispositivo

cards.title: Sistema de Reserva de Pel√≠culas Online-Cinebook
cards.description: Plataforma completa para reserva de entradas de cine en m√∫ltiples ubicaciones, con autenticaci√≥n de usuario, selecci√≥n de asientos, procesamiento de pagos y m√≥dulos de gesti√≥n.
cards.detailedDescription: Este sistema de reserva de pel√≠culas online permite a los usuarios ver las pel√≠culas en cartelera y pr√≥ximos estrenos en todas las sedes de cines del pa√≠s. Los usuarios pueden ver las sedes con su informaci√≥n y horarios de funciones. Tras autenticarse, pueden seleccionar asientos para la funci√≥n deseada en la sede elegida, proceder al pago con su m√©todo preferido y recibir los detalles de la reserva con un c√≥digo QR. El sistema incluye m√≥dulos para gerentes de cada sede (para gestionar funciones, personal y estad√≠sticas) y un m√≥dulo de administrador para gestionar todo el sistema (pel√≠culas, usuarios, sedes, estad√≠sticas generales). Los usuarios tambi√©n pueden comprar golosinas para su funci√≥n.
cards.objective: Crear una plataforma completa y f√°cil de usar para reserva de entradas de cine que optimice el proceso de reserva mientras proporciona herramientas de gesti√≥n integral para administradores de cines en diferentes niveles.
cards.intendedFor: Cadenas de cines que busquen una soluci√≥n integrada de reservas, cin√©filos que deseen una forma conveniente de reservar entradas online, y administradores de cines que necesiten herramientas de gesti√≥n para sus sedes.
features: Sistema de autenticaci√≥n de usuarios con JWT seguro
Visualizaci√≥n de pel√≠culas en cartelera y pr√≥ximos estrenos en todas las sedes
Informaci√≥n detallada de cada sede con horarios de funciones

Integraci√≥n de m√∫ltiples m√©todos de pago

cards.title: Integral Medical Management System (Medicare)
cards.description: Web platform designed to optimize the administration and operation of medical centers, clinics, and hospitals with modules for patients, doctors, and administrators.
cards.detailedDescription: Medicare is an integral web system designed to improve the operational and clinical management of medical centers, hospitals, and clinics. The system allows centralization of patient administration, doctors, medical appointments, departments, and hospital resources, facilitating efficient communication between the various stakeholders. It includes a public information area and a private area managed by roles (patient, doctor, administrator).
cards.objective: To provide an intuitive and functional digital solution that enables medical centers to streamline their internal processes, from appointment scheduling to medical staff and clinical resource management, improving the experience for both patients and healthcare personnel.
cards.intendedFor: Small and medium-sized medical centers, public and private hospitals, specialized clinics, and healthcare professionals who require a digital management tool.
cards.observations: The website that is available is a demonstration of the informational part of the system; the administration and management part for patients and doctors is not available on the website.
features: Informational site with services, specialties, news, and multimedia gallery
Secure user registration and login with JWT authentication
Patient module to schedule appointments and view medical reports
Doctor dashboard to manage assigned patients and appointments
Full administrator dashboard with complete control over users, doctors, patients, departments, rooms, beds, shifts, roles, and more
Secure system through JWT authentication and encrypted passwords
Scalable architecture based on NestJS (Backend) and React (Frontend)
challenges: Implementing secure authentication with JWT and role-based route protection
Designing a scalable architecture for multiple modules and roles
Managing complex relationships in the MySQL database
Creating intuitive and responsive interfaces for all roles

cards.title: Cineverse - Your Cinematic Universe
cards.description: Complete platform for movie lovers offering access to films, series, exclusive news, and detailed data on box office, budgets, and production performance.
cards.detailedDescription: Cineverse is a digital ecosystem created by a developer and film enthusiast to deliver a unique experience when interacting with the entertainment world. It combines high-quality audiovisual content with exclusive data from a custom-built web scraping API, including real-time box office stats, historical comparisons, full profiles of actors and directors, and an always-updated news section.
cards.objective: To create an immersive and personalized platform that connects movie and series fans with relevant content, deep insights, and exclusive news ‚Äî all in one place.
cards.intendedFor: Film enthusiasts, series fans, entertainment lovers, and anyone interested in detailed data about movies and audiovisual productions.
features: Access to trending movies and upcoming releases
TV series with season/episode details and full cast information
Smart search by title, actor, or director
Exclusive box office data: daily, weekly, and global
Historical comparisons between blockbuster films (e.g., Endgame vs Avatar)
Budgets, earnings, and ROI calculations for productions
Detailed profiles of actors and directors with bios and filmographies
Fun facts and behind-the-scenes trivia from the film industry
Up-to-date news section: premieres, trailers, festivals, behind-the-scenes
Real-time updates on series renewals and cancellations
Personalized interface with dark/light mode and automatic language detection
100% responsive design for any device
challenges: Developing a custom API using ethical web scraping techniques
Handling large volumes of real-time data without a traditional database
Optimizing performance for complex search queries
Maintaining stability amid changes in external data sources
Designing an intuitive interface that manages multiple content types seamlessly

cards.title: Hacienda Villa Blanca - Cattle Ranch
cards.description: Informational website for a cattle ranch focused on sustainable agriculture, high-quality livestock, conservation projects, and ecotourism.
cards.detailedDescription: Hacienda Villa Blanca is a cattle ranch dedicated to sustainable agricultural production, selective breeding of high-quality livestock, environmental conservation, and ecotourism. This website was developed to showcase its history, products, conservation projects, available cattle breeds, guided tours, sustainable farming workshops, fairs, and worker testimonials. It includes an interactive location map, a contact page with a message form, and links to social media.
cards.objective: To create an attractive and functional digital presence that allows Hacienda Villa Blanca to showcase its activities, products, and values, facilitating connections with customers, tourists, and collaborators interested in sustainable farming and quality livestock.
cards.intendedFor: Clients interested in quality livestock, tourists, environmental institutions, students, sustainable farmers, and the general public interested in ecotourism and responsible agricultural production.
features: Presentation of the ranch‚Äôs history and core values
Detailed information on agricultural and livestock production
Cattle breed catalog with descriptions, characteristics, and pricing
Conservation and sustainability projects section
Ecotourism promotion with guided tours and educational activities
Sustainable farming workshops and events such as fairs
Testimonials from workers and collaborators
Interactive map showing the ranch‚Äôs location
Contact page with message form and social media links
Modern, responsive, and accessible design for all devices
challenges: Organizing multiple content types into a clear and engaging structure
Integrating an interactive map with a smooth user experience
Designing an easy-to-navigate and visually appealing breed catalog
Ensuring a consistent user experience across mobile and desktop devices
Optimizing site performance with high-quality images

cards.title: Online Movie Booking System-Cinebook
cards.description: Comprehensive platform for movie ticket reservations across multiple cinema locations, with user authentication, seat selection, payment processing, and management modules.
cards.detailedDescription: This online movie booking system allows users to browse current and upcoming movies across all cinema locations in the country. Users can view cinema locations with their information and showtimes. After authentication, users can select seats for their desired showtime at their chosen cinema location, proceed to payment with their preferred method, and receive booking details with a QR code. The system includes modules for cinema branch managers to manage their specific location (showtimes, staff, statistics) and an admin module to manage the entire system (movies, users, cinema locations, general statistics). Users can also purchase snacks for their movie session.
cards.objective: To create a complete, user-friendly movie booking platform that streamlines the ticket reservation process while providing comprehensive management tools for cinema administrators at different levels.
cards.intendedFor: Cinema chains looking for an integrated booking solution, moviegoers who want a convenient way to book tickets online, and cinema administrators who need management tools for their locations.
features: User authentication system with secure JWT implementation
Browse current movies and upcoming releases across all cinema locations
View cinema locations with detailed information and showtimes
Interactive seat selection interface
Multiple payment method integration
Booking confirmation with QR code
User profile with booking history and personal information
Snack purchasing system for movie sessions
Cinema branch manager module to manage showtimes, staff, and location statistics
Admin module to manage movies, users, cinema locations, and view general statistics
Responsive design for all devices
challenges: Implementing real-time seat availability and reservation system
Designing a secure authentication and payment processing system
Creating an intuitive seat selection interface
Managing complex relationships in MongoDB for showtimes, seats, and bookings
Developing role-based access control for different user types (regular users, branch managers, admins)
Implementing QR code generation and validation system
Ensuring data consistency across multiple cinema locations

es.title: Curriculum
es.university: Universidad Nacional Experimental de las Fuerzas Armadas (UNEFA)
es.carreerDescription: La Ingenier√≠a de Sistemas es un campo interdisciplinario que combina principios de ingenier√≠a, pensamiento sist√©mico y t√©cnicas avanzadas de resoluci√≥n de problemas para dise√±ar, analizar y optimizar sistemas complejos. Una Licenciatura en Ingenier√≠a de Sistemas proporciona a los estudiantes los conocimientos t√©cnicos y las habilidades de gesti√≥n necesarias para desarrollar soluciones integradas en industrias como la aeroespacial, la defensa, la automotriz, la salud, las telecomunicaciones y las infraestructuras inteligentes. A lo largo del programa, los estudiantes aprenden a: Analizar y definir los requisitos del sistema seg√∫n las necesidades de las partes interesadas. Dise√±ar arquitecturas de sistemas integrando hardware, software y factores humanos. Aplicar el modelado y la simulaci√≥n para predecir el comportamiento del sistema. Gestionar proyectos y riesgos mediante metodolog√≠as de ingenier√≠a estructurada. Validar y optimizar sistemas mediante pruebas y la gesti√≥n del ciclo de vida.  Los temas clave que se abordan incluyen teor√≠a de sistemas, sistemas de control, rob√≥tica, integraci√≥n de software, inteligencia artificial y gesti√≥n de proyectos. Los graduados est√°n preparados para carreras como ingenieros de sistemas, analistas de sistemas, gerentes de proyectos o consultores, capaces de afrontar los retos de la automatizaci√≥n, la log√≠stica, la ciberseguridad y las tecnolog√≠as emergentes. Al combinar fundamentos te√≥ricos con proyectos pr√°cticos, esta licenciatura prepara a los futuros ingenieros para crear sistemas eficientes, sostenibles e innovadores que aborden las complejidades del mundo real.
es.schoolDegreeDescription: El bachillerato en ciencias es una formaci√≥n acad√©mica que se centra en las ciencias b√°sicas, como la qu√≠mica, la f√≠sica, la biolog√≠a y las matem√°ticas. Se diferencia del bachillerato en ciencias de la salud, que se enfoca en ese campo espec√≠fico.
es.htmlCssJavascript: TypeScript, React, and Modern Web Technologies
es.frontDevDescription: Como desarrollador frontend especializado en TypeScript y frameworks modernos de JavaScript, dise√±o aplicaciones web robustas y f√°ciles de mantener que ofrecen experiencias de usuario excepcionales. Mi experiencia va m√°s all√° de traducir dise√±os a c√≥digo: desarrollo sistemas frontend escalables con un tipado s√≥lido, una arquitectura basada en componentes y optimizaci√≥n del rendimiento.
es.analysis: Dise√±o e implementaci√≥n de sistemas escalables
es.analysisDescription: Me especializo en el dise√±o, an√°lisis e implementaci√≥n de sistemas escalables de alto rendimiento que resuelven desaf√≠os empresariales complejos. Mi enfoque combina una profunda experiencia t√©cnica con pensamiento estrat√©gico para construir arquitecturas robustas que evolucionan con las necesidades de la organizaci√≥n. Mis principales √°reas de especializaci√≥n son: an√°lisis y arquitectura de sistemas, desarrollo e implementaci√≥n, infraestructura y DevOps, y sistemas distribuidos con alta disponibilidad y consistencia.
es.backDevDescription: Dise√±o e implemento sistemas backend seguros y de alto rendimiento que impulsan aplicaciones web escalables. Mi experiencia abarca todo el espectro backend, desde el desarrollo de API hasta la optimizaci√≥n de la infraestructura, con un fuerte enfoque en el desarrollo con seguridad de tipos mediante TypeScript y frameworks modernos. Mis competencias principales son: desarrollo de API, gesti√≥n de bases de datos, sistemas de datos, DevOps e infraestructura, optimizaci√≥n del rendimiento, integraci√≥n con servicios de terceros, procesamiento y an√°lisis de datos, control de calidad, tareas cron y programadas.

en.title: Curriculum
en.university: National Experimental University of the Armed Forces (UNEFA)
en.carreerDescription: Systems Engineering is an interdisciplinary field that combines engineering principles, systems thinking, and advanced problem-solving techniques to design, analyze, and optimize complex systems. A Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in Systems Engineering equips students with the technical knowledge and managerial skills needed to develop integrated solutions across industries such as aerospace, defense, automotive, healthcare, telecommunications, and smart infrastructure. Throughout the program, students learn to: Analyze and define system requirements based on stakeholder needs. Design system architectures by integrating hardware, software, and human factors. Apply modeling and simulation to predict system behavior. Manage projects and risks using structured engineering methodologies. Validate and optimize systems through testing and lifecycle management.Key topics covered include systems theory, control systems, robotics, software integration, artificial intelligence, and project management. Graduates are prepared for careers as systems engineers, systems analysts, project managers, or consultants, capable of tackling challenges in automation, logistics, cybersecurity, and emerging technologies.By blending theoretical foundations with hands-on projects, this degree prepares future engineers to create efficient, sustainable, and innovative systems that address real-world complexities.
en.schoolDegreeDescription: The Bachelor of Science is an academic training that focuses on basic sciences, such as chemistry, physics, biology and mathematics. It differs from the Bachelor of Health Sciences, which focuses on that specific field.
en.htmlCssJavascript: TypeScript, React, and Modern Web Technologies
en.frontDevDescription: As a frontend developer specializing in TypeScript and modern JavaScript frameworks, I architect robust, maintainable web applications that deliver exceptional user experiences. My expertise extends beyond translating designs into code - I build scalable frontend systems with strong typing, component-based architecture, and performance optimization.
en.analysisDescription: I specialize in designing, analyzing, and implementing high-performance, scalable systems that solve complex business challenges. My approach combines deep technical expertise with strategic thinking to build robust architectures that evolve with organizational needs,mi core expertise are :system analysis & architecture,development & implementation,infrastructure & DevOps,distributed systems with high availability & consistency
en.backDevDescription: I architect and implement high-performance, secure backend systems that power scalable web applications. My expertise spans the full backend spectrum from API development to infrastructure optimization, with a strong focus on type-safe development using TypeScript and modern frameworks.My core  competencies are : API Development,Database Management,Data Systems,DevOps & Infrastructure,Performance Optimization,Integration with Third-Party Services,Data Processing and Analytics,Quality Assurance,Cron Jobs and Scheduled Tasks

es.title: Conoce mi Historia
es.paragraph1: Nac√≠ en Carora, estado Lara, Venezuela, el 30 de marzo de 1999, hijo de Ana √Ålvarez, una dedicada profesora, y V√≠ctor Camacaro, tambi√©n profesor.Llegu√© al mundo en el hospital Dr. Pastor Oropeza a las 11:30 p.m., en el seno de una familia humilde, de bajos recursos, pero llena de amor.Aunque no tuvimos lujos, las ganas de superaci√≥n de mi madre fueron el motor que nos impuls√≥ a mejorar poco a poco nuestra situaci√≥n econ√≥mica.
es.paragrapgh2: Mis primeros a√±os estuvieron marcados por el amor y el esfuerzo de mi madre, quien trabajaba arduamente para asegurarse de que no me faltara lo esencial.Viv√≠amos en una casa prestada, hasta que, con mucho sacrificio, logramos adquirir nuestro propio hogar. En ese momento, la casa no era m√°s que un rancho, pero ese mismo a√±o naci√≥ mi hermana, Roxana Camacaro,         y con trabajo, dedicaci√≥n y esfuerzo, fuimos transformando poco a poco ese rancho en un verdadero hogar.
es.paragraph3: Esta historia me recuerda una frase de Nelson Mandela: "Siempre parece imposible hasta que se hace". Nuestra vida ha sido un reflejo de esa verdad, demostrando que con determinaci√≥n y esfuerzo, se puede construir algo grande a partir de lo m√°s humilde.

en.title: Get to Know My Story
en.paragraph1: I was born in Carora, Lara state, Venezuela, on March 30, 1999, son of Ana √Ålvarez, a dedicated teacher, and V√≠ctor Camacaro, also a teacher. I came into the world at the Dr. Pastor Oropeza Hospital at 11:30 p.m., into a humble family,with few resources, but full of love. Although we did not have luxuries,my mother's desire to excel was the driving force that drove us to gradually improve our economic situation.
en.paragraph2: My early years were marked by the love and effort of my mother, who worked hard to make sure I never lacked the essentials.We lived in a borrowed house until, with much sacrifice, we managed to acquire our own home. At that time, the house was nothing more than a shack, but that same year my sister, Roxana Camacaro, was born, and with work, dedication and effort, we gradually transformed that shack into a real home.
en.paragraph3: This story reminds me of a quote from Nelson Mandela:  "It always seems impossible until it is done." Our life has been a reflection of that truth, proving that with determination and effort, something great can be built from the most humble things.
